Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cardclasses

Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.cardclasses.Weapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Card
    public class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
implements Card
    This class represent all in-game weapons.

    Instances of this class will be used as components for Run-Time combinations of effects.

    See Also:
    FunctionalFactory

      This constructor initializes all values to null.
      Weapon​(java.util.ArrayList<Color> price, WeaponName name, java.lang.Boolean isLoaded)
      This constructor initializes a weapon card instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Weapon

        public Weapon()
        This constructor initializes all values to null.

      • Weapon

        public Weapon​(java.util.ArrayList<Color> price,
              WeaponName name,
              java.lang.Boolean isLoaded)
        This constructor initializes a weapon card instance.

        This constructor should only be invoked in a game setup phase.

        Parameters:
        price - the arraylist of ammunition.
        name - the weapon identifier.
        isLoaded - a boolean that indicates if a weapon is loaded or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getPrice

        public java.util.ArrayList<Color> getPrice()
        This method return an arraylist containing all ammo boxes to be paid for a full reload of a weapon.

        The purchase price for a weapon shouldn't consider the ammo box in the first position of the list.

        Returns:
        an arraylist of a Color enumeration representing the full reload price of a weapon.

      • getName

        public WeaponName getName()
        This method returns the weapon identifier.
        Returns:
        a WeaponName enumeration to identify all weapons.

      • getIsLoaded

        public java.lang.Boolean getIsLoaded()
        This method returns the loaded state of a gun.

        If a isLoaded attribute is false the weapon is not loaded and vice versa.

        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates if the weapon is loaded or not.

      • setName

        public void setName​(WeaponName name)
        This method sets the name value to another enumerated WeaponName class.
        Parameters:
        name - is a WeaponName enum object to which set the new name.

      • setPrice

        public void setPrice​(java.util.ArrayList<Color> price)
        This method sets a new arraylist of Color as new price.
        Parameters:
        price - a new ArrayList of Color to which set the new price.

      • setIsLoaded

        public void setIsLoaded​(java.lang.Boolean value)
        This method sets the new Boolean value for the isLoaded attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - a Boolean to which isLoaded will be set.

      • reload

        public void reload()
        This method reloads a weapon.

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        This method compares two Weapon objects and returns true if they are to be considered equals.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - a Weapon object to be compared with the Weapon object that called this method.
        Returns:
        true if two Weapon objects have the same name (There is only 1 sample of each weapon in a match).
